title: 820-00923-A   Only one power port out of 4 work and only if I plug it in upside down.
message:
I know that no schematic exists for this model but I am using 820-00293 

I am looking at the USB-C signals off of J3300 and there are top and bottom.  Both go to the same CD-3215 depending on the port used.  All 4 ports are dead but one works if I plug the charger in upside down.

Would it be safe to assume I need to replace all the CD3215's on this LB?

title: 820-00923-A   Only one power port out of 4 work and only if I plug it in upside down.
message:
Start with the port which works one direction only.
Check diode mode to ground for CC1/2 pins.

title: 820-00923-A   Only one power port out of 4 work and only if I plug it in upside down.
message:
CC1 is basically a short
CC2 is 0.02

I have been poking around on these.   Lots are shorted.   Some are fine when I slide the surge diodes off others are not

title: 820-00923-A   Only one power port out of 4 work and only if I plug it in upside down.
820-00923-A   Only one power port out of 4 work and only if I plug it in upside down.
message: I changed them.   Still had problems.  :(  replaced the LB
